name: Sunny Castform
description: The Weather Pokémon. Castform's appearance changes with the weather. This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.

abilities.name: Forecast
abilities.description: This Pokémon changes form with the weather. In rain it becomes water-type, in harsh sunlight it becomes fire-type, in cold and snowy conditions it becomes ice-type. In all other conditions it is normal-type. Its STAB, resistance, immunities, and vulnerabilities change to match the form it takes.
